thread.title: Home And Away star Esther Anderson marries Howard Moggs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Home And Away star Esther Anderson marries Howard Moggs | Daily Mail Online

author: Jade Watkins For Daily Mail Australia
title: Home And Away star Esther Anderson marries Howard Moggs | Daily Mail Online
text: Former Home And Away star Esther Anderson has tied the knot with her fiance, Howard Moggs. The couple, who currently live in LA, exchanged nuptials back home in Australia. The romantic ceremony took place in Esther's hometown of Geelong, just outside of Melbourne. Scroll down for video Wedding bells! Former Home And Away star Esther Anderson has tied the knot with her fiance, Howard Moggs 'It was magic, just ridiculously beautiful and romantic,' the brunette beauty told New Idea in an exclusive interview. 'I have never been so happy in my whole life.' Blushing bride Esther, who was the picture of elegance in a low-cut beaded gown by Israel bridal house Berta Bridal, was walked down the aisle by her father Jack after the pair arrived at stunning Terindah Estate on the Bellarine Peninsula in a cream vintage Jaguar. Hometown nuptial: The romantic ceremony took place in Esther's hometown of Geelong, just outside of Melbourne Esther's maid of honour was her sister Lara Eldridge, and other guests included the actress's former cast mates, Tessa James, and Bernard Curry and Kimberly Cooper, who performed at her reception. Before exchanging stunning Cartier rings, the groom broke down in tears as he watched his bride, 35, walk down the aisle. 'You are the proof that dreams come true,' he said in his vows. 'I look forward to every day because you are part of it.' Esther and Howard got engaged last February, again revealing the happy news in an interview with New Idea magazine. The Celebrity Apprentice favourite told how Howard proposed at the couple's new Los Angeles home on Valentine's Day. She initially thought that when he suggested they take some champagne into their back garden, the pair were going to celebrate the purchase of their new house. Longtime lovers: Esther and Howard got engaged last February, again revealing the news in an interview with New Idea magazine But she got a huge surprise when Howard got down on bended knee, surrounded by tealights at sunset. 'I thought it was a lovely way to celebrate our new home but suddenly he was down on one knee asking me to marry him,' she explains. 'I didn't see it coming at... I was speechless until I realised I hadn't said "yes".' The couple have been dating for just over a year after being introduced by a friend and live in Los Angeles permanently. When asked by the publication if the couple want children, Esther gushed: 'Oh yes. We both definitely want them. It's the first thing our families asked about. But woah - we just want to enjoy being engaged for now.' Homegrown talent: Esther - who is originally from Victoria's Geelong - is well known for her role on Australian soap Home and Away Esther - who is originally from Victoria's Geelong - is well known for her role on Australian soap Home and Away. The stunner played resident policewoman Charlie Buckton on the show from 2008 until 2012 when her character was killed off. The former model soon relocated to the US and friend and fellow actress Pia Miller replaced her on the show as the gorgeous Summer Bay policewoman.
